message: It may be a little early to be asking this, but have you guys decided what the final the final title of the game is going to be? When we load it up, is it just going to say "Riven", or will it change to "realRiven" or "The Starry Expanse Project"?
In other words, does "The Starry Expanse Project" refer simply to the process of porting the game to realtime 3d, or is it the title of the game as well?

You are asking two different questions (as you undoubtedly noticed).  Firstly, indeed The Starry Expanse Project refers to the project or process leading to the result of a Riven in realtime. Also read the first lines from the page at this link: http://www.starryexpanse.com/what-is-starry-expanse/ .   Secondly, we are wondering too, just as much as you are, what we will choose as the name for the final final end result ;-) . So at this point, no, it is not yet chosen to be the name for the final product.

I'm hoping (as I suppose we all are) that eventually Cyan will sign off on this project and grant it the use of the name realRiven. Assuming Starry Expanse is completed and of sufficient quality, there is really no point not using that name and making it official. It would be very nice to know that they are on board, have their logo on the game (sort of like it was in Myst IV, just as a "we said this was OK" type of thing), etc.
